name: Natural Killer Cell (Tanuki dog Studios, Latent_Gecko, zebbe94)
name_original: Natural Killer Cell (Tanuki dog Studios, Latent_Gecko, zebbe94)
description:
Natural killer cell is an epic and brief story based singleplayer game with a big focus on shooting cute aliens, a perfect game to experience for those who enjoyed the old source games. Find your own playstyle and choose your favorite weapon from a wide variety of choices. Kick some alien ass and save the human colony from the invasion!

This project was done during a game development course at Stockholm University, it is one of the first games we have ever made.
